name: Washed Up (itch)
description:
Zeke is a wondering rogue, seeking justice for his lost family. He was blown off an airship during his journey and washed up on a deserted island. Can Zeke find a way to escape the clutches of the island, or will he meet his doom?



Washed Up is an entry for the Lartu's Mini-RPG One Week Jam by FricknAGames.

With this game, since we only had a week to complete it, we wanted to see what we could squeeze into a game in Smile Game Builder. We like this engine because it's easy to get a game started in. We pushed through some of the limitations and even though it's a little buggy in spots, we are pretty happy with the results. 

Also, be sure to follow us on facebook! 

**Edit 3/11/2018**

Android Test Version added to downloads. We know it's buggy but this is a good test to see if your phone\tablet can run the game. We recommend hardware equivalent to a Galaxy S6 or higher. You must enable the" install from unknown sources" option for this to install on your Android device.
